QuestData.Title: Vengeful Souls
QuestData.Description: The Tomb of Lights has become corrupted by the Shadow Council and the draenei dead have become cursed spirits, angry and confused with a burning hatred for the living.$b$bEnter the tomb and seek out these tragic victims. Give them the rest that they deserve.
QuestData.LogDescription: High Priest Orglum wants you to journey into the Tomb of Lights and defeat 5 Vengeful Draenei.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have saved us all. What can we do to thank you?
QuestData.RewardText: On behalf of the tortured souls you have freed, I thank you, $r.
